thread.section_title: Portrait Roma - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 10 stars are not enough!
thread.title_full: 10 stars are not enough! - Review of Portrait Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: aminmilan
title: 10 stars are not enough!
text:
Where do we start? This hotel is amazing! Warm friendly lifestyle team, amazing rooms thar cater for everything.
We got off the plane and they were kind enough to let us check in early.
The beds, kitchenette, sofas, everything is bright, warm, thoughtful and efficient.
You are truly made to feel like an honoured guest.
Compared to the Armani in Milan where we subsequently checked in, the lifestyle team's warmness and genuine staff at the Portrait Roma beats them by a huge huge margin. (See my separate review of the armani milan).
We truly enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to have a fantastic pampering stay.
You will not be disappointed.
This hotel is THE HOTEL to stay in Rome.
5 stars do not do this hotel justice.
It deserves 10 stars.
